alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:49PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grady and east central Caddo Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Gracemont, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gracemont, Cogar and Lake Chickasha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
